text:
Release date
March 2024
Question asked
Is this a three-way split or are non-guaranteed hours employees part of temporary/permanent
employees?
ESRS reference
ESRS S1 paragraphs 50 (b), AR 55, and AR56
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 211 of 278
ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
Key Terms
Employees permanent; employees temporary; employees non-guaranteed hours
Background
